subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
lead_paragraph: The reigning Horse of the Year, who will attempt to win a second consecutive Breeders’ Cup Mile, has catapulted his Brooklyn-born trainer into racing’s limelight.
snippet: The reigning Horse of the Year, who will attempt to win a second consecutive Breeders’ Cup Mile, has catapulted his Brooklyn-born trainer into racing’s limelight.
